EmailTemplate.subject: Request for P45
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for submitting your tax information.
You have indicated that you have a current P45. This needs to be submitted to us to ensure we put you on the correct tax code. Please note the P45 is only current if it meets the following criteria:
It is dated in the current tax year which commenced on 6 April 2014. (If the P45 relates to any previous tax year it is not valid for employment in this tax year). The P45 relates to your most recent employment and you have not carried out any paid work since you received it.
If your P45 meets the above criteria, please send it to Mandy Nicolls at the following address:
Evolution Recruitment Ltd 11A Hillgate Place London SW12 9ER
N.B If your P45 was issued electronically please email this to staffing.support@the-challenge.org
Best wishes,
e. staffing.support@the-challenge.org The Challenge
CR 1.6.8
